Chandrabhaga Eco retreat

From 14 December 2019 to 31 January 2020, the Eco Retreat gave an unique experience of Glamourous Camping in 50 luxury cottages, delectable cuisine, beach spa, adventure & water sports activities, nature trails and wholesome day itineraries, cultural evenings, and a lot more.


The Eco Retreat had a full-fledged corporate conferencing facility with 150 pax. Apart from the exclusive facilities, the Eco Retreat comprised of a food festival, a beach market, and an events venue for mega evenings which enticed everyone.


The retreat also offerd tourists a taste of local culture, artisans, folk artists & musicians of Odisha, which echoed for a month.
